backend/main.mo: Defines order-related types and an actor providing CRUD operations for orders, payment confirmations, and status updates with timeline events.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that upgrades stored orders by adding status and statusEvents while keeping existing fields intact.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of various frontend files, describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Empty marker file preserving the Android platform directory for future Capacitor builds.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, and Android build settings.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with theme variables and light/dark mode rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting up PWA metadata, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, and display settings.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Documentation explaining how to build the Android APK using Capacitor and required tooling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation, admin access, ordering flow, WhatsApp integration, and APK download handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Checks availability of the admin APK and downloads it or shows an unavailable warning.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, and managing orders with detail views and quick stats.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Displays detailed order info in a sheet and allows admins to update order status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: Provides payment and status filter controls for the admin orders list.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Renders the admin orders table with status, payment info, and a view-details action.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: UI for selecting plate type and quantity, validating minimum order rules, and creating an order.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Renders the ownerâ€™s photo with size options and a fallback image on load error.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Displays payment instructions, UPI actions, WhatsApp links, and a payment confirmation form after an order is placed.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Timed promotional popup encouraging users to order, with session-based dismissal.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Generic modal showing text content with optional WhatsApp link copying and dismissal.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Defines APK download configs for customer and admin apps.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Stores business payment settings such as UPI VPA, delivery charge, and name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all orders for the admin dashboard when authorized.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Mutation hook to create new orders and invalidate order caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication.
Mutation hook to update order status and refresh admin order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Mutation hook to submit payment confirmation details and refresh orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom theme variables and animations.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Utilities to read an admin token from the URL hash and verify authorization.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Helpers to check APK availability, download APKs, and retrieve unavailable messages for customer and admin builds.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum plate rules for delivery and provides related validation and error messages.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Builds UPI deep links, opens various UPI apps, and supports copying payment links to clipboard.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs against format and placeholder patterns and returns a generic error message.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links for order messages, payment confirmations, and screenshot requests, and provides open helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React, React Query, and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, typography, and container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, admin panel features, and existing requirements.
